name: Space Battle Pong
description:
Hello!

Use WASD and Arrow keys to control the shields (paddles) and guns (serve). You shoot (serve) with the space bar. Try playing vs the AI!

This game is still in development, as I intend to add power ups and calibrate the AI better. Any suggestion is greatly appreciated. This is my first 2D game, and my project for my Unity course. I hope you enjoy it! Try to compete against your friends!
